timeline.message:
Marks analytical tasks as AutoRegister.

These are typically classes not interfaces so they need this
annotation to be automatically picked up by the framework.
Adds some boilerplate methods when checking execution flags.

Provides the initial implementation of the performance flags framework.

See src/main/java/sirius/biz/analytics/flags/README.md for a description
of the framework.
Permits an analytical task to throw an exception as these are handled anyway.
